alert.note: Alert for Ottawa (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 05 at 4:30AM CDT until April 05 at 5:00AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 500 AM CDT FOR EASTERN OTTAWA COUNTY... At 430 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 5 miles northwest of Seneca, moving northeast at 70 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations in or near the path include... Quapaw... Wyandotte... Ottawa... Peoria... Twin Bridges State Park... This includes Interstate 44 between mile markers 310 and 324. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
